segments.text: How do you spend your free time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I read or go swimming , go shopping , usually . I run or play tennis or do something else like those to get some exercises to keep fit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wouldn't call myself extroverted . Sometimes , I enjoy being by myself very much . But other times , I like sharing activities with others too , especially during these last few years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kinds of sports do you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like almost all sports , and I enjoy both playing and watching . I especially like tennis and mountain climbing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What kind of personality do you think you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I approach things very enthusiastically , I think , and I don't like to leave something half-done . It makes me nervous-I can't concentrate on something else until the first thing is finished .
segments.speaker: S2
